img_text: I DONT KNOW IF ITS JuST MY IMAGINATION, BUT THIS DOESN'T SEEM LIKE SUCH A NICE PRESENT TO ME! GOOD EYE, DABI! YOU'RE EXACTLy RIGHT! AND AS YOU SEE A RESULT HE'S GIGANTOMACHIA'S IN DESPAIR!
